name: Elections Commission - G. K. M. G. Thilakarathne of the Ambagamuwa Pradeshiya Sabha has vacated his office of member of the United National Party -  K. Yogendran of the Maskeliya Pradeshiya Sabha has vacated his office of member of United National Freedom Front - S. P. G. Dilrukshi Kumarasingha of the Rideegama Pradeshiya Sabha has vacated her office of the member Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna
